name: SpookyButtons
0:
”Alexa open Spooky Buttons”
”Alexa ask Spooky Buttons to Spook Me”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spooky buttons
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Have fun spooking all the neighborhood kids this Halloween!! 

We searched through over 2000 sounds to get the BEST 100 available anywhere! This skill is not just a soundtrack. It is ACTUAL SOUNDS played in a RANDOM order!

Our Spooky Buttons skill eliminates the headaches of spending a lot of money on a CD, hiding the player, and having to pause and restart it. It also plays the sounds randomly, so your guests will be surprised and you don't get tired of hearing it over and over!

To hear a spooky sound, just say Alexa Spook Me! Or say Alexa Loop Mode On and we'll shuffle and play the sounds all evening.

** EXCITING!! ** Best of all, if you have Amazon's Echo Buttons, you can put your Alexa on your front porch and press your button from some distance away to trigger the next random spooky sound at JUST THE RIGHT TIME for the unsuspecting trick-or-treater! We intentionally left the button colors off, so you can hide them easily.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
